ConnectionProxySyntaxItem.Description: Provide the hostname, an IPv4 address, or an IPv6 address enclosed in "[ ]". Examples: www.cooldomain.com, 192.168.2.3 or [2001:db8:85a3:8d3:1319:8a2e:370:7348]. This value is overriden with the log's value when #MULTICONNECTION is used.
ConnectionProxySyntaxItem.Label: Host

ConnectionProxySyntaxItem.Description: Fill in https for example. If nothing is filled in, http is used. This value is overriden with the log's value when #MULTICONNECTION is used.
ConnectionProxySyntaxItem.Label: Protocol

ConnectionProxySyntaxItem.Description: Port used to connect to the webserver.By default this is set to 80 (use 443 for https). Beware to update the used port to match the protocol. This value is overriden with the log's value when #MULTICONNECTION is used.
ConnectionProxySyntaxItem.Label: Port
